metadata.title: CVE-2020-16156 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
CPAN 2.28 allows Signature Verification Bypass.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16156` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcgi-fast-perl - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm4
libperl5.18 - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm4
perl - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm4
perl-base - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm4
perl-debug - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm4
perl-modules - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: perl package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm4').
